channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: On a testé l’Anod Hybrid 2 et ses supercondensateurs : le vélo électrique qui a la recharge la plus rapide du monde
item.description: Premier vélo électrique à adopter la nouvelle génération de supercondensateurs en lieu et place d’une batterie lithium-ion, l’Anod Hybrid 2 est aussi le plus rapide à se recharger, tout en étant performant, efficient et connecté. Nous l'avons testé, voici notre verdict.

item.title: I’ve shot over 1,000 photos with the Ricoh GR IV – here are my favorites, and one new feature stands out
item.description: The Ricoh GR IV succeeds the GR III with a new 26MP and improved five-axis stabilization, better battery life and more internal storage. But are those upgrades enough?

item.title: The agentic internet is coming – and businesses need to be ready
item.description: Autonomous AI agents are changing how people and businesses interact online. Is your organization ready?

item.title: Liverpool vs Nottingham Forest live streams: How to watch Premier League 25/26 clash online
item.description: We'll show you all the ways you can watch Liverpool vs Nottingham Forest in the Premier League this Saturday, including cheap options.

item.title: Vie numérique | Écouteurs Bluetooth : deux produits à découvrir
item.description: Le marché des écouteurs Bluetooth est une jungle. Entre les produits d’Apple, de Sony et de Bose, et une marée de marques génériques à bas prix, il est difficile de s’y retrouver. Voici deux produits qui, à la veille de la période des Fêtes, proposent des nouveautés qui ne vous feront pas regretter votre achat.

item.title: À 599 €, l’iPhone 16e devient enfin recommandable pour le Black Friday
item.description: On a beaucoup critiqué son prix de lancement, mais là, le discours change. Pour le Black Friday, l'iPhone 16e passe sous une barre psychologique critique sur Amazon, et c'est soudainement une toute autre histoire.

item.title: The Ninja Slushi Early Black Friday Deal Is the Lowest We've Seen
item.description: The Black Friday sale on this popular slushie machine is the lowest price it's been since its release.

item.title: C’est du délire : la meilleure imprimante 3D de Bambu Lab est bradée
item.description: Ne scrollez pas si vous voulez une machine qui marche vraiment en sortant du carton. La Bambu Lab P1S Combo perd une grosse partie de son prix, et franchement, à ce tarif, la concurrence a du souci à se faire.

item.title: I track Dell laptop prices all year: these are the 9 best Black Friday deals I've found from just $299 today
item.description: Looking for a new Windows laptop? Here are the 9 best Dell Black Friday laptop deals, with record-low prices on TechRadar's favorite models.

item.title: Is Incognito Mode actually private? Here’s the surprising answer from cybersecurity experts
item.description: Incognito Mode might sound like a secret window to the web. But experts say it’s not as private as you might think.

item.title: Le Black Friday Week fait -40 % sur l’Ultimate Ears Boom 4, une puissante enceinte Bluetooth pour ambiancer la fin d’année
item.description: L'Ultimate Ears Boom 4 est une enceinte Bluetooth au design séduisant, à la conception robuste, étanche, à retrouver pour 89,99 euros au lieu de 149,99 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: Wales vs New Zealand free streams: How to watch Autumn International 2025, TV Channels, Preview & Team News
item.description: All the ways to watch Wales vs New Zealand live streams online, with the All Blacks looking to end their 2025 Autumn International campaign on a high in Cardiff.

item.title: The Climate Impact of Owning a Dog
item.description: My dog contributes to climate change. I love him anyway.

item.title: The 44 Best Movies on Netflix, WIRED’s Picks (December 2025)
item.description: Frankenstein, The Twits, and A House of Dynamite are just a few of the movies you should watch on Netflix this month.

item.title: The 44 Best Shows on Netflix, WIRED's Picks (December 2025)
item.description: The Witcher, Splinter Cell: Deathwatch, and Splinter Cell: Deathwatch are just a few of the shows you need to watch on Netflix this month.

item.title: I tested the Sonos Arc Ultra and compared it to a top JBL Dolby Atmos soundbar – here’s the one I’d recommend you buy
item.description: The Sonos Arc Ultra and JBL Bar 1000 MK2 are two of the best – and priciest – soundbars you can buy. But which one is better?

item.title: This week in business: A housing plateau collides with an AI reality check
item.description: Consumer protests aim at Black Friday, chip stocks fall ahead of Nvidia’s big moment, and housing settles into a long plateau. Even Etsy is caught in the Epstein fallout. This week, politics, memes, and protest movements kept colliding with the economy, turning everything from Black Friday shopping to stock charts into a referendum on power and attention....

item.title: The Argos Black Friday sale includes record-low prices on our favourite TVs, laptops, headphones, and much more
item.description: There's no need to wait if you're looking for record-low prices on TVs, laptops, appliances and more in the huge Argos Black Friday sale.

item.title: 17 Best French Presses (2025): Plastic, Glass, Stainless Steel, Travel
item.description: The humble French press is affordable, effective, and hard to mess up. Here are our favorites to make your morning cup of coffee.

item.title: Google's new AirDrop feature is great for Pixel phones – but it can’t chase Apple’s tail forever
item.description: Google’s strategy with the Pixel 10 seems to be becoming the iPhone for Android fans – I’m hyped to see AirDrop and MagSafe-type features come to Pixel, but imitation will only go so far.

item.title: US Border Patrol Is Spying on Millions of American Drivers
item.description: Plus: The SEC lets SolarWinds off the hook, Microsoft stops a historic DDoS attack, and FBI documents reveal the agency spied on an immigration activist Signal group in New York City.

item.title: Microsoft created a tablet years before Apple, but it never took off - here's why
item.description: Bill Gates proudly displayed a pioneering Microsoft tablet device way back in 2000, but it never really took off.

item.title: Too good to be true? Be careful when looking through those Black Friday offers - they might be a scam
item.description: Black Friday is a scammers paradise, and 2025 might be the worst it has ever been, experts warn.

item.title: Pendant la Black Friday Week, ce smartphone pliant à clapet coûte moins de 400 €
item.description: Le Motorola Razr 40 Ultra de 2023 est un smartphone pliable à clapet qui a plus d'un atout, notamment au niveau de son design et de son interface. En cette Black Friday Week, vous le trouverez à seulement 399 euros sur Amazon alors qu'il en valait 1 200 euros à son lancement.

item.title: My favorite VPN for gaming just dropped its prices by up to 77% − here's how to grab yours
item.description: It's here early. NordVPN, our pick for the best VPN service, has dropped its Black Friday prices. Get the top-rated gaming VPN for just $2.99 a month, a massive 77% saving on a two-year plan.
